properties.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Greater Lake Tahoe Area
properties.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 7 at 10:29AM PST until January 8 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph
expected. Waves 2 to 4 feet from mid-lake to north and east
shores.

* WHERE...Lake Tahoe.

* WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone
to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until
conditions improve.
properties.instruction:
Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a
sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing
boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

NWSheadline: LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY FOR LAKE TAHOE
